website_summaries.verdict: An affordable feature-packed option for a day at the beach. Available in black or teal.
pros: The large bag has lots of room for everything you need at the beach
It can fit up to 4 big towels in its main compartment
On the exterior of the bag, there are two pockets for extra storage
Padded handles make the bag comfortable to carry
cons: Doesn't stand up on its own – falls over unless propped up against something

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take to Hawaii...we’ve taken our babies diaper bag to the beach before and had sand in it for weeks, so I wanted a bag specifically for this trip. It’s really large, but folds down small. The very bottom part is the cooler and that doesn’t collapse as much, but you can roll the whole bag into that part to pack it. It has one outside pocket with a zipper. It’s a simple bag but will be easy to clean and I love that it has a place to keep drinks and snacks cold. I’ll add to the review after our trip!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Winn

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Cooler bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for the summer- the bottom zips off and is the perfect size for a 6pack and a plastic sandwich caddy. FYI: The bag will not stand up if the bottom is empty and zipped on, so your stuff will spill out. Use the zipper! If you can, find a hard plastic insert for the bottom. The mesh is very light weight, but super strong, I've actually been using mine for hauling stuff back and forth to work.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: 2) the zippered pocket in front and zippered top are nice upgrades over my old pool bag 3) came with ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) The cooler section in the bottom is nice- big enough for some drinks and sandwiches. 2) the zippered pocket in front and zippered top are nice upgrades over my old pool bag 3) came with a waterproof phone case which was a nice bonus My cons are 1) The bag has a factory smell that just won’t air out, even with febreeze, even being left outside 2) The bag part itself is just not big enough for a family of 4- I think I fit 2-3 towels and a bottle of sunscreen. It’s nice if you need 1-2 towels but not the huge family catch all bag I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beach bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for swim class initially but will definitely use it for a beach bag in summer! I love how much you can fit in it and the cooler spot on the bottom. Currently I am using the cooler spot for her pull-ups and swim diapers for class but it will be nice for snacks in summer! It is long tho with the cooler at the bottom and with it on my shoulder the bottom of it hits about my hips. Just something to keep in mind because it bothered me at first.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea G.

customer_reviews.title: Very functional!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love my beach bag! It’s has so many functions. I loved the fact that when we would go to the beach in Jamaica I could put my cold drinks in the bottom part that is a cooler and they would stay cold until I needed them. Inside zipper for unseen small items and outside pockets for anything you wanted to put in it. Just a really multi purpose beach bag. I love love it n
customer_reviews.author: Yo Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is made with quality materials, it has a zipper to close and velcro on the handle for easy carrying. The cooler bottom is amazing for drinks and sandwiches or snacks. I wanted something to take to the beach and water parks and now that I have received it I think this would be great for road trips also. I absolutely love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lori L Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Tote bag, used it on a Disney Cruise and Island.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our Disney Cruise to the Caribbean and it served us well, plenty of space for towels, little water toys and water bottles. I also used the side pockets to store ID cards and our cell phones. Great purchase, the quality of the product is comparable to more expensive totes out there.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Great for sporting events
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. This will be my “go to” baseball tournament bag. It will hold all my summer essentials and cold drinks easily. I like that the cooler is kind of hidden. It doesn't really look like the typical cooler bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cali B.

customer_reviews.title: ... was a bit too "floppy" and just not very sturdy. But as soon as I filled it
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the bag was a bit too "floppy" and just not very sturdy. But as soon as I filled it, it stands up just like the picture. I had 4 beach towels, several things of sunscreen and room to spare. The "floppiness" of it actually came in handy as I was able to stow it under my chair once I'd removed the towels. The bottom cooler held more than enough for a day at the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Gillett

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: I've used this as a beach bag but more importantly as my carry-on. All of my children's medications were zipped in the bottom leaving plenty of room for other necessities in the zipper top.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I now have two! So perfect for the beach. The sand doesn’t get trapped in there, and there’s a cooler for snacks. And a phone pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great bag with great free gift!!
customer_reviews.text: So cooler on the bottom is awesome! Can also hold wet clothes/ bathing suits. Bag holds a good amount of items and the free phone waterproof case it's awesome!! Great value
customer_reviews.author: Mandie

customer_reviews.title: The bag seems very useful - about the right size for a visit to ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag seems very useful - about the right size for a visit to the beach with just the right number of compartments. I like that I can keep money/phone/keys separated from the main bag and zippered. And the main bag is zippered as well so everything is secure. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: My Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Bag !
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag ! I love finding ways to keep my sunscreens cool and bought this bag thinking it just might be the way to do it...and it worked. I took it with me to a resort in Mexico a few weeks ago and put in a cold water and beer with my sunscreens and ALL stayed cool. It is a great size and comfortable to carry. Since coming home, I’ve taken it to the pool with snacks in the pouch and a freezer pack and had a few people ask where I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Great size not too big not too small
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bag for 3 weeks on a daily basis is holding up well and the cooler works just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dinasch

customer_reviews.title: Nice beach bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for the beach or other outdoor adventures. The major downfall is the carrying strap is too short to carry on your arm.
customer_reviews.author: Starfish

customer_reviews.title: Works well for what was looking for
customer_reviews.text: As described but not as sturdy as expected. Doesn’t hold as much as would like but works well
customer_reviews.author: Jenn M

customer_reviews.title: Bulky bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is made in a way that the top is very flimsy. It’s big and bulky with the cooler on the bottom and not comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: stace171

customer_reviews.title: Love this beach bag!
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome tote. Took on a cruise and also used for the pool, the beach and snorkeling!
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH

customer_reviews.title: Best Beach Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag was big and held everything necessary. I I’ve the cooler on the bottom for drinks and snacks also. This item exceeded my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Bella

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I been looking for. Love the compartment that you can throw in your wet swimsuit with your cold drinks or just to hold food for a picnic at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: jamie007

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get stuff from the insulated bottom is a bit of a hassle when the mesh part is full.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Jackson

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing! It’s big and spacious and the cooler on the bottom is huge! If you are a beach person, this tote is a MUST!
customer_reviews.author: N. Oyola

customer_reviews.title: Ok beach bag, straps are short
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the beach because of the cooler section on the bottom but the bag is just ok. The straps are a bit short. It fills up with sand. The cooler section is pretty small. And when the bag is packed full it’s hard to carry due to the short straps.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in one beach bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! Just the right size to tote everything you need for a day at the beach. The cooler is large enough for a six pack of bottle of wine plus food for 2. It also came with a phone protector for the water. Great value
customer_reviews.author: maramima

customer_reviews.title: Bag is smaller than expected and doesn’t function well.
customer_reviews.text: I finally used this bag this weekend for first time to the pool. First off the zippers are hard to work. Second the bag will not sit up unless you jam all kinds of bottles and food items in the cooler area under bag. Lastly it’s a pain to use and doesn’t adequately accommodate toys and two beach towels. Huge disappointment and I won’t be using it again. Money wasted. Because past 30 days I’m stuck with an item I can’t use. Hopefully manufacturer stands behind product and accepts return and refund.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We took this on our beach honeymoon. It was perfect. We put a few of the blue ice blocks in the bottom and our drinks stayed cold for several hours. The top fit our towels, hats, shirts/shorts and flip flops. Zipper seems strong and we had no issues in the week we used it (everyday).
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag, but I wish the bottom cooler part wasnt soft and kept it's shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for hauling family beach/swim gear
customer_reviews.text: Like it and agree with other reviews it doesn’t stand up and that was a bit of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: KMorgan

customer_reviews.title: okay bag
customer_reviews.text: it's an okay bag, not exactly what I expected, but should do the job
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cookingham

customer_reviews.title: Needed to return this
customer_reviews.text: Returned this because the image shows that it holds more in the cooler than it really does
customer_reviews.author: mary stone

customer_reviews.title: Beach bag with insulated bottom
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to using it next week at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Holds alot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: The bottom holds about 5 bottles of water, Will not stand up unless something is in the bottom of the bag
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: and it is best used as an all-in-one bag as opposed to just ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fill and gift to a friend who just moved to the beach. I have had a similar bag, and it is best used as an all-in-one bag as opposed to just being a beach bag or just a cooler. Perfect for lightening your load when walking or biking to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: SharonS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice beach bag! Worked great and folds down flat for easy packing for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Krisann2

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was a little flimsy at first but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a little flimsy at first but it has worked well for those quick trips to the beach without hauling a cooler. Lots of storage.
customer_reviews.author: T Ralph Tennant

customer_reviews.title: This thing can pack/hold a lot and was super durable with a family of 5 on the beach ...
customer_reviews.text: SO MUCH ROOM! This thing can pack/hold a lot and was super durable with a family of 5 on the beach for 4 days!
customer_reviews.author: Caffee

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much ordered a second for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality and size.Ordered this one for a gift
customer_reviews.author: Michael melchionne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag for clipping on to stroller and carrying necessities.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: It’s an ok bag
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for the bag. Love that it has the built in cooler but the straps are too short and rough on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Life saver! What a great purchase for our beach vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big and holds ice for my drinks or keeps cell phone from over heating
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W.

customer_reviews.title: nice size
customer_reviews.text: Love the bottom zippered insulated pocket & the size of the bag...will use this often
customer_reviews.author: Shelter Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great beach bag
customer_reviews.text: It was great having the insulated cooler section - either to keep drinks and food cool or just to use for protecting items from sun and sand.
customer_reviews.author: JanetB.

customer_reviews.title: zipper broke first day
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke the first time we tried to use the bag.
customer_reviews.author: jaksmom

customer_reviews.title: loved the bag but the mesh part ripped a little ...
customer_reviews.text: loved the bag but the mesh part ripped a little about a week after I got it. but still worth the money. came in handy when I went to the beach
customer_reviews.author: carlson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Love this bag and it has a zipper ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Love this bag and it has a zipper to keep all your items inside. Cooler portion worked great and is a descent size.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just love perfect. I sneak some drinks to many place in the lower compartment and keep good temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This bag was great!! We used it at the water park, cooler didn't leak and bag part was nice and roomy!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lintel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and specious
customer_reviews.text: Hold alot of items. Wonderful for a long beach day!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Davila

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: i love this bag was a lifesaver in Greeve but the handles are not the best
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: It had a strong smell for a few days after delivery but subsided after I took it to the pool.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great can’t wait to take it to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: material and zipper are poor quality. Purchased 1 for myself and another as ...
customer_reviews.text: material and zipper are poor quality. Purchased 1 for myself and another as a gift. I was embarrassed to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I could of bought two for your purchase at Walmart if I knew they carried them before I bought yours
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: All in one tote
customer_reviews.text: Love the cooler built in on the bottom. Use it at the pool and beach all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as I gift in Christmas and so many people loved it I’m buying some more this year. Great product and great company.

customer_reviews.title: This product is great, and not only the product but the company ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, and not only the product but the company as well, great contumer service, will recommended to all my family and friends.......

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size bag
customer_reviews.text: Not too big, not too small, the cooler is perfect on keeping drinks cold while on the beach!

customer_reviews.title: Smells like smoke!! Do not buy !!
customer_reviews.text: I was very unhappy with my bag. It REEKED of smoke. Yuck !!! It was also very floppy and not well made. Pretty bummed about this purchase

customer_reviews.title: Great beach bag
customer_reviews.text: Holds plenty of items and the Cooler has plenty of storage.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: Love how you can store cold things in the bottom. Just wish it was bigger.

customer_reviews.title: Have not used yet but the quality is very good, large carrying space and large cooler space
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet but the quality is very good, large carrying space and large cooler space. I look forward to taking it on our vacation.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small, cheaply construction. About right for the price, but definitely won't make several seasons.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this! It fits so much stuff! It's the perfect shower/beach/camping bag!!

customer_reviews.title: was perfect for the beach and other excursions
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a cruise, was perfect for the beach and other excursions.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than it appears in the picture, but i think it will work

customer_reviews.title: I received a used bag with a receipt and food ...
customer_reviews.text: I received a used bag with a receipt and food in the front pocket from the previous owner. No free waterproof cellphone case either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for a day at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the main bag part falls into the cooler part when you go to unzip it but there's really no way around that. Great bag, love that the top zippers... Small zipper pocket in the front is great for the small stuff you dont want getting lost.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Pijoan

product_meta.title: Odyseaco Mesh Beach Bag Tote with Detachable Insulated Cooler Large Zippered High Capacity (Black)
product_meta.description:
Pick up your Odyseaco Aruba beach tote bag today and enjoy:



• A DURABLE HARD WEARING BEACH BAG - Designed and built to last, the perfect family beach bag for beach or pool.


• A LARGE CAPACITY - Perfect for towels and beach toys. With the mesh netting encouraging airflow bad odors from wet towels and toys are reduced.


• REINFORCED PADDED HANDLES - Giving you a comfortable fit and making the bogg bag easy to carry even when full.


• 2 LINED EXTERNAL POCKETS - For additional secure storage for car keys, sun lotion or additional items.


• NOW WITH TOP ZIPPER - To keep everything nice and secure inside the mesh bag!


• AN ADDITIONAL COOLER BAG FEATURE - Great for keeping your child's lunch cool and fresh or your baby's milk cool.


Click ADD TO CART today and let the Aruba Beach Bag make your family days out easier.What's more, when you buy today you'll enjoy our no-quibble 12 month warranty. 

Sold exclusively by OdyseaCo
feature_bullets: BEST BEACH BAG | Enjoy the convenience of this fashionable, lightweight, canvas and mesh zippered beach bag with an additional cooler bag compartment.

PLENTY OF ROOM | This lightweight 20"x16"x6" beach tote bag can easily carry 4 large beach towels and features two external pockets, one zippered for valuables or cell phone, plus another for sunscreen and additional items for your day ahead.

UNIQUELY STYLED | Durable in construction with padded, reinforced handles for comfort and a 9" shoulder drop, this bogg bag is perfect for the beach, pool, parks, picnics, BBQ's, camping, road trips, vacations, festivals, travel and sporting events.

INSULATED COOLER BAG | Featuring an additional insulated cooler bag section with an easy to clean flexible soft liner, perfect for keeping your food and drinks cool and fresh. This picnic lunch cooler bag attribute makes the bag a must for any parent.
SUPERIOR QUALITY ASSURED | Buy with confidence today and enjoy our one year warranty. Perfect for family days out. - GRAB IT NOW - INCLUDES BONUS WATERPROOF CELL PHONE CASE TODAY!
